name: Chess of Chains
description:
Chess of Chains is a 2D turn-based strategy game. Control chess pieces to tear down tight defense, like never before.

The levels start with a "stalemate" full of hidden opportunities. Every action taken has the chance to change the game state in multiple ways, leading to more creative plays. It goes on and on from there.

Chess of Chains currently has 20 hand-crafted levels. Ranging from beginner levels to complex ones that need more thought. Together they capture the most interesting interactions within the set of mechanics.
